b'Akai Shouzou: Char, Soshite Frontal e': b"A recap of Gundam, Gundam Z, Gundam ZZ, and Char's Counterattack as experienced by Char Aznable, as well as a precursor to Gundam Unicorn. \n\nOriginally a live event consisting of a public recitation done by Char's voice actor with simultaneous screenings of the anime, the DVD version fades to and from the recitation and the anime. "
[b'Mobile Suit Gundam', b'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam', b'Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ', b"Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack", b'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn']
